---
title: "Brand"
format: html
---

The `brand` option is used to define cross-format branding. You can read more about using [Brand in the Guide](/docs/authoring/brand.qmd).

Set brand options in the `_brand.yml` file:

```{.yaml filename="_brand.yml"}
color:
  palette:
    blue: "#1c84e5"
  foreground: blue
```

Alternatively you can set, or override, options in the document header under `brand`:

```{.yaml filename="document.qmd"}
---
brand:
  color:
    palette:
      blue: "#1c84e5"
    foreground: blue
---
```
